content.text: Sensei Ira, is a fictional character played by Lance Krall in the television series The Office.
Ira is Dwight's karate sensei. He referees a sparring match between Dwight and Michael. He says, "No points for pants."

Sensei Ira is brought in as a candidate for the junior sales position at the Scranton branch for which Dwight brings in all his friends to be considered. He sits in the conference room with all the other people while waiting to be interviewed. He shows up in his martial arts uniform (Junior Salesman). He is later metioned as a being a sheister.
